actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT "Payment"."amount" as "amount", count(*) as count, "amount" * count(*) as  "productRevenue" FROM "Payment" where "Payment"."createdAt" >= {{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date - interval '330 minutes' and "Payment"."createdAt" <= {{moment(DatePicker2.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date + interval '1110 minutes' and "status" = 'responseReceivedSuccess' and "amount" = '2249' group by "Payment"."amount"
UNION
SELECT "Payment"."amount" as "amount", count(*) as count, "amount" * count(*) as  "productRevenue" FROM "Payment" where "Payment"."createdAt" >= {{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date - interval '330 minutes' and "Payment"."createdAt" <= {{moment(DatePicker2.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date + interval '1110 minutes' and "status" = 'responseReceivedSuccess' and "amount" = '2749' group by "Payment"."amount"
UNION
SELECT "Payment"."amount" as "amount", count(*) as count, "amount" * count(*) as  "productRevenue" FROM "Payment" where "Payment"."createdAt" >= {{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date - interval '330 minutes' and "Payment"."createdAt" <= {{moment(DatePicker2.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date + interval '1110 minutes' and "status" = 'responseReceivedSuccess' and "amount" = '1999' group by "Payment"."amount"
